rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Kukuri, Kazuna, and Martis... All
three of them are off to the theological
school next year, you know...

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0002
rows.name:
To be honest, I'm worried. What
if they get bullied over there?

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I know it's not until next
year, right? But still...

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Even if we're not related by
blood, I worry about them as
if they were my own children.

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0005
rows.name:
What is it, Rex? You're
back awfully early.

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Don't go doing something uncool
when you're about to set off
on a journey with a girl.

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0009
rows.name:
Get yourself properly prepared, and
then move forward! You got that?!
